title: COVID vaccines don't work for some people
author: The Colorado Sun
description: One of the National Jewish doctors on the study, Shu-Yi Liao [assistant professor of medicine at CU School of Medicine], called the results "a novel finding" among COVID research. "Initially people thought, 'I'm fully vaccinated; I'm safe,'" he said. "But right now that's not necessarily the truth."
sitename: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus
cleaned_text: One of the National Jewish doctors on the study, Shu-Yi Liao [assistant professor of medicine at CU School of Medicine], called the results "a novel finding" among COVID research. "Initially people thought, 'I'm fully vaccinated; I'm safe,'" he said. "But right now not necessarily the truth." CU Anschutz Fitzsimons Building
